thread.title: Saktidas
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Saktidas

author: Saktidas
title: Saktidas
text:
I am always happy with your quality and service. However, its very rare that I can come to know about the size or the weight of the cake that I need to order. A more detailed physical specifications would give better idea to enable choosing from the list...
thanks and regards
